translation.en: ♪ Jingle bell Jingle bell, jingle bell rock ♪
♪ Snowin' and blowin' up Bushels of fun ♪
Okay.
Happy holidays.
Mr. Braymore.
-Oh. Hi, Molly. -How are you?
Good. Did you decide on catering for the city hall weekly dinners?
translation.it: Bene. Ha già scelto il catering per le cene del Municipio?

translation.en: We did, and we're going with the Bradford Bros.
translation.it: Sì. Ci affideremo a Bradford Bros.

translation.en: They offered us a discount on a surf-and-turf we just couldn't pass up.
translation.it: Ci hanno fatto un'offerta irrifiutabile sul menù mare e monti.

translation.en: I understand.
If you need anything, you know where to find me.
translation.it: Se le serve qualcosa, sa dove trovarmi.

translation.en: Molly's Menu Magic: you name it, we cater it.
translation.it: Il Magico Menù di Molly: al vostro servizio.

translation.en: -[chuckles] Bye. -Bye, Molly.
"Committed to food excellence."
-How'd it go? -Good.
Chamber of Commerce loved the sandwiches and cookies.
translation.it: La Camera di commercio ha gradito tutto.

translation.en: They placed a standing lunch order for their monthly meeting.
translation.it: Ci hanno affidato i loro pranzi mensili.

translation.en: That's great.
But we lost city hall weekly dinners to the Bradford Bros.
translation.it: Ma abbiamo perso le cene del Municipio a favore di Bradford Bros.

translation.en: What? No!
Adding insult to injury, those were all over town. That was actually on the front door.
translation.it: Per di più, questi erano dappertutto, persino alla nostra porta.

translation.en: They would love getting every catering job, even if it meant putting us out of business.
translation.it: Vorrebbero accaparrarsi tutti i clienti, anche a costo di farci fallire.

translation.en: Well, good thing we put out the magnets before the holiday season.
translation.it: Fortuna che abbiamo dato le calamite prima delle feste.

translation.en: Those were a brilliant idea because no one throws magnets away, unlike…
translation.it: Sono state un'idea geniale. Nessuno le getta via, al contrario di…

translation.en: -Any new calls? -No.
I should probably get in line to see Santa with all the other kids in town.
translation.it: Forse dovrei mettermi in fila per Babbo Natale.

translation.en: If you think that'll work, I'll come with you.
translation.it: Se pensi che funzionerà, verrò con te.

translation.en: Okay, there. What do you think?
You are amazing.
You know, it's just missing one thing.
-[Molly] There. -You are amazing.
I love it. I'm gonna go drop it off.
Great. I'll start on the quiches. Oh, I am meeting my brother for dinner.
translation.it: Ottimo. Io preparo le quiche. Per cena mi vedo con mio fratello.

translation.en: -Do you mind locking up after? -Oh, yeah. No problem.
-Tell Kyle I say hi. -I will.
translation.it: - Saluta Kyle da parte mia. - Lo farò.

translation.en: Are you sure you can't join us for Christmas in the Keys?
translation.it: Passerai il Natale con noi alle Keys?

translation.en: The beach house has more than enough room.
translation.it: La casa al mare è molto grande.

translation.en: I wish I could. I have a couple holiday orders.
translation.it: Vorrei tanto, ma ho un paio di ordini per le feste

translation.en: I can't afford to cancel them.
We're proud of you, baby sis.
You're really making a go of your catering company.
Well, I've sunk every penny I have into it.
translation.it: Ho investito tutti i miei soldi in quest'attività.

translation.en: It's my lifelong dream. I… I can't afford to fail.
translation.it: È il mio grande sogno. Non posso permettermi di fallire.

translation.en: It hasn't even been a year and you're already too busy for the annual Frost family Christmas vacation.
translation.it: Nemmeno un anno e sei già troppo impegnata per passare il Natale in famiglia.

translation.en: We'll celebrate Christmas when I'm back.
[Kyle] Is that…
That's my ex and his new girlfriend.
translation.it: Il mio ex con la sua nuova ragazza.

translation.en: I thought he was a decent guy. What happened?
translation.it: Pensavo che fosse in gamba. Cos'è successo?

translation.en: We weren't on the same page and it took me much longer than it should have to realize that.
translation.it: Volevamo cose diverse e ci ho messo fin troppo a capirlo.

translation.en: And he refused to try new food.
In my experience, the three Cs of a healthy relationship
translation.it: Per me, i tre pilastri di una relazione sana

translation.en: are communication, commitment, and compromise.
translation.it: sono il dialogo, l'impegno e i compromessi.

translation.en: Okay. Well, I will remember that when I decide to dive back into the dating pool.
translation.it: Ok. Beh, lo terrò presente quando deciderò di rimettermi in gioco.

translation.en: I just want you to be happy.
If I can make Molly's Menu Magic a success,
translation.it: Se farò decollare Il Magico Menù di Molly,

translation.en: I will be as happy as a kid on Christmas morning.
translation.it: sarò felice come un bambino a Natale.

translation.en: [British accent] Welcome home, Mr. Harrison.
Or should I say Mr. Jacob?
[British accent] Very funny, Robert.
[laughing, American accent] Oh, Cars, it's good to see you.
-It is good to see you too. -Once a year doesn't seem enough.
translation.it: - Anche per me. - Una volta l'anno è poco.

translation.en: Not much use for event photographers around here.
translation.it: Qui non servono i fotografi di eventi.

translation.en: -Do you have any luggage? -No. I'll get it later.
translation.it: - Hai qualche bagaglio? - Lascia, lo prendo dopo.

translation.en: Where is she?
She's in the library putting the finishing touches on the Christmas tree.
translation.it: È in biblioteca a finire di addobbare l'albero di Natale.

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna catch up with you later.
translation.it: Ok. Tu ed io parleremo più tardi.

translation.en: I wanna surprise her.
There.
Now you look perfect.
[gasps] Carson!
I'm so glad you're home.
translation.it: Sono felice che tu sia qui.

translation.en: Oh, I'm so glad to be back.
You don't normally come until the morning of the Christmas Gala.
translation.it: Di solito, arrivi la mattina del gala di Natale.

translation.en: Well, my show in Milan ended early, so…
translation.it: L'evento di Milano è finito presto.

translation.en: I'm glad, and I expect full photo approval.
translation.it: Sono contenta e mi aspetto di poter approvare le foto.

translation.en: -Oh, that goes without saying. -[laughs]
-Are you hungry? -Uh, no.
I'll make myself something later if I get hungry.
translation.it: Se mi verrà, mi preparerò qualcosa.

translation.en: Since when do you cook?
Well, I'm a whiz in the kitchen with anything to do with mixing milk or water.
translation.it: Sono un mago in cucina quando si tratta di mescolare latte o acqua.

translation.en: Just the basic things.
Shall I show you the plans for this year's Christmas Gala?
translation.it: Ti mostro i piani per il gala di Natale di quest'anno?

translation.en: It's pretty much the same every year, isn't it?
translation.it: È più o meno lo stesso ogni anno.

translation.en: Tell you what, next year when you take over the foundation,
translation.it: Facciamo così, l'anno prossimo, quando rileverai la Fondazione,

translation.en: you can change things up however you like.
translation.it: potrai cambiare tutto ciò che vuoi.

translation.en: I am not taking over the foundation.
One of the cousins will be much better.
translation.it: I cugini sono molto più adatti di me.

translation.en: The cousins have too many responsibilities as it is
translation.it: I tuoi cugini hanno già fin troppe responsabilità

translation.en: and are already stretched too thin.
Tell you what, you're tired. We will discuss this at another time.
translation.it: Sai che ti dico? Ora sei stanco. Ne discuteremo in un altro momento.

translation.en: That sounds good.
Carson, I'm glad you're home.
translation.it: Carson, sono felice che tu sia a casa.

translation.en: So am I.
Tell me about Milan.
-Morning. -Good morning.
Would you like some juice or a Danish?
translation.it: Gradisci un succo o una brioche?

translation.en: Uh, no. Just some tea.
translation.it: No. Solo un po' di tè.

translation.en: Ah, I got it. You don't have to take care of me.
translation.it: Ci penso io. Non devi occuparti di me.

translation.en: It's my job to take care of you.
translation.it: Occuparmi di te è il mio lavoro.

translation.en: Maybe it's time to settle down in one place?
translation.it: Non credi che sarebbe ora che ti sistemassi?

translation.en: Wow.
That was an amazing impression of Aunt Jean.
I may be parroting her concerns, but I think of you like my own nephew.
translation.it: Forse scimmiotto le sue preoccupazioni, ma penso a te come a un nipote.

translation.en: I know, but I enjoy not having my future mapped out for me.
translation.it: Lo so, ma mi piace non avere il futuro programmato.

translation.en: No obligations, no one knows I'm part of the Harrison dynasty.
translation.it: Nessun obbligo, nessuno sa che sono un Harrison…

translation.en: Your aunt worries about you. I know she's looking forward to--
translation.it: Tua zia si preoccupa per te. So che non vede l'ora di…

translation.en: The Gala is a thank-you to our board and benefactors,
translation.it: È un gala per il nostro Consiglio e per i benefattori.

translation.en: and I will not serve them an over-salted entrée
translation.it: Non gli propinerò un primo troppo salato

translation.en: and dessert bars that taste as if they came from the day-old section of the supermarket.
translation.it: e un dessert che sembra provenire dal reparto offerte del supermercato.

translation.en: You quit? Fine.
And meanwhile, I will look for a caterer who understands the meaning of high-quality cuisine.
translation.it: Cercherò un servizio di catering che si intenda di cucina di alta qualità.

translation.en: Thank you. Goodbye.
We need a new caterer.
-Christmas Gala's in eight days, right? -I am well aware of that.
translation.it: - Il gala non è tra otto giorni? - Ne sono consapevole.

translation.en: Robert, who else do we have in the file?
translation.it: Robert, chi altro abbiamo in lista?

translation.en: Oh, my. I appreciate your organizational abilities.
translation.it: Fantastico. Apprezzo le tue abilità organizzative.

translation.en: So…
which shall we choose?
Hello?
Happy holidays. How can I help you?
Uh… I'm looking for Molly Frost.
I'm Molly.
I'm Jean Harrison of the Harrison Foundation.
translation.it: Sono Jean Harrison, della Fondazione Harrison.

translation.en: Yes, of course. Your family's done incredible things for the community.
translation.it: Sì, certo. La sua famiglia ha fatto tanto per la comunità.

translation.en: Your grant to the local school saved the arts program.
All of the programs, really. It's incredible.
What can I do for you, Mrs. Harrison?
translation.it: Che cosa posso fare per lei?

translation.en: I could've called, but I find it is important
translation.it: Avrei potuto chiamare, ma credo che sia importante

translation.en: to see the catering premises for myself.
Understood. We have all our licenses and certifications.
translation.it: Capisco. Abbiamo tutte le licenze e le certificazioni.

translation.en: Yes, I see that.
Every year we have a Christmas Gala with a dinner on December 23rd.
translation.it: Ogni anno, il 23 dicembre, organizziamo una cena di gala.

translation.en: -I know it's short notice. -I would love to.
Excellent.
Are you available to come for an interview
translation.it: È disponibile a venire da me per un colloquio,

translation.en: this afternoon at three o'clock?
Oh, an interview?
I need to be assured that you can indeed create magical cuisine.
translation.it: Devo appurare che lei sappia creare delle ricette magiche.

translation.en: Of course. I will be there.
Thank you for the opportunity.
No, thank you.
Hey.
Hi.
Jean Harrison might want us to cater the Harrison Foundation Christmas Gala.
translation.it: Forse forniremo il catering per il gala di Natale di Jean Harrison.

translation.en: -That's the biggest event of the year. -I know.
We have to be there at 3:00. I think she might want us to make her a meal.
translation.it: Ci aspetta da lei alle 15:00. Vorrà che le cuciniamo qualcosa.

translation.en: But what about the Christmas dessert
translation.it: Ma che mi dici del dolce di Natale

translation.en: that we're catering for the senior citizen event this afternoon?
translation.it: per l'evento degli anziani di questo pomeriggio?

translation.en: Right. That's today.
Okay. If you can do that on your own, maybe Cindy can help me.
translation.it: Ok. Se riesci a cavartela da sola, potrei farmi aiutare da Cindy.

translation.en: -Uh… -Oh, no. She's out of town.
You don't know him, but my friend Taylor is a fantastic sous chef
translation.it: Il mio amico Taylor è un ottimo sous-chef

translation.en: and he's in between jobs right now.
translation.it: ed è in cerca di lavoro.

translation.en: -I'll just text him. -Yes, please.
He's one town away, so he's not that far.
translation.it: - Vive in un paese qui vicino. - Ottimo.

translation.en: -Great. -[phone chimes] He's free. Wow. Amazing.
-Okay, tell him to meet me there. -Okay.
translation.it: - Digli che ci vediamo lì. - Ok.

translation.en: Now I just have to figure out what to serve.
Oh, you got this.
You must be Molly.
Lovely to meet you, Mr. Harrison.
Mr. Harrison passed many years ago.
translation.it: Il sig. Harrison è morto anni fa.

translation.en: I'm Robert, the long-time, but not long-suffering, estate manager.
translation.it: Robert. Amministro la proprietà da lungo ma non immemore tempo.

translation.en: -Please come in. -Thank you.
Wow. It's beautiful.
Jean decorated everything herself.
translation.it: Jean ha decorato tutto da sola.

translation.en: Let me show you the kitchen.
This is my dream kitchen.
translation.it: È la cucina dei miei sogni.

translation.en: Jean would like you to prepare her a three-course holiday meal.
translation.it: Jean ha richiesto un menù di tre portate.

translation.en: You will, of course, be compensated for your time today.
translation.it: Naturalmente, sarà pagata per il lavoro di oggi.

translation.en: Any dietary restrictions?
None whatsoever, though she does have a certain fondness for chocolate.
translation.it: Nessuna. E ha una certa predilezione per il cioccolato.

translation.en: After my own heart. When my sous chef arrives, will you send him in?
translation.it: Proprio come me. Quando arriva il sous-chef, lo mandi qui.

translation.en: Certainly. Good luck.
Thank you.
[Molly] There you are. Finally.
-Finally? -Are your hands clean?
-Just washed 'em. -Great. You can finish mincing the celery.
translation.it: - Le ho appena lavate. - Bene. Tritura il sedano.

translation.en: Carrots need to be julienned, parsnips need to be peeled and chopped.
translation.it: Grattugia le carote e pela e affetta la pastinaca.

translation.en: What are we making?
An heirloom tomato salad with lemon-thyme panko-crusted chicken and parsnip purée.
translation.it: Pomodori con pollo marinato in crosta di panko e purè di pastinaca.

translation.en: For dessert, a pistachio cranberry fudge brownie.
translation.it: Per dolce, brownie al pistacchio e mirtilli.

translation.en: Yum. Hope I get to have some.
translation.it: Buono. Spero di poterne avere un po'.

translation.en: Very funny.
Get to work. We don't have much time.
Yes, ma'am.
The celery needs to be minced.
Cut into very small pieces?
[Carson] Is that better?
Who taught you how to hold a knife?
You move your hand up like that.
translation.it: Sposta la mano più su, così.

translation.en: That's better.
-This needs to be perfect. -Why's that?
Didn't Christina tell you?
This is for Jean Harrison.
She's fired nearly every catering company she's ever used.
translation.it: Ha licenziato quasi ogni catering che ha avuto.

translation.en: Apparently, she's impossible to please.
Is that so?
Who else hires a caterer to come to their house and cook as an interview?
translation.it: Chi altro assumerebbe uno chef per sottoporlo a una prova?

translation.en: Well, I guess you didn't have to come.
Are you kidding?
This dinner could make my career.
I need this job.
Gotcha.
Your sous chef is here. He's washing his hands.
translation.it: Il sous-chef è qui. Si lava le mani.

translation.en: -Then who…? -Carson, what are you doing down here?
translation.it: - Allora chi… - Carson, che ci fai qui?

translation.en: I was just coming in to get a snack, and I was put to work.
translation.it: Avevo fame, ma mi ha messo al lavoro.

translation.en: Your aunt would like to see you.
Your aunt?
Wh-Who's your aunt? Not…
translation.it: Chi è tua zia? Non sarà…

translation.en: Jean Harrison. Yeah.
Look, I'm really sorry.
I was just…
Everything looks delicious.
[Robert] Carson!
I'm sorry.
And good luck.
Is that Champagne vinegar?
Yes. I found some in the back of the pantry.
You should've used the grainy mustard.
translation.it: Avrebbe dovuto usare la senape in grani.

translation.en: And I think it needs a touch more garlic to balance out the lemon.
translation.it: E penso che serva un po' più di aglio, per smorzare il gusto del limone.

translation.en: You really know your flavoring agents.
I have hosted many, many dinner parties over the years.
translation.it: Ho dato molte cene, nel corso degli anni.

translation.en: Oh, you're done? Would you like the dessert?
A brownie?
Yes. I adapted my grandmother's recipe. She used to make it every December.
translation.it: Sì. Ho rivisitato la ricetta di mia nonna. Lo preparava ogni dicembre.

translation.en: This is very good.
Thank you.
But it doesn't compare with my grandfather's Christmas walnut fudge.
translation.it: Ma non è paragonabile al caramello alle noci di mio nonno.

translation.en: If you have the recipe, I would be happy to make it for you.
translation.it: Se ha la ricetta, glielo preparo con gioia.

translation.en: Unfortunately, the recipe was never written down,
translation.it: Sfortunatamente, non è mai stata messa per iscritto

translation.en: and despite many attempts, no one has ever managed to re-create it.
translation.it: e nonostante i molti tentativi, nessuno è mai riuscito a ricrearla.

translation.en: I'm sorry if this was not to your taste.
translation.it: Mi spiace che non le piaccia.

translation.en: Oh, no. It was delicious.
-Oh, so does that mean-- -Don is on the phone.
translation.it: - Questo significa che… - C'è Don al telefono.

translation.en: That's the president of my board. I must take this, if you'll excuse me?
translation.it: È il presidente del mio Consiglio. Devo rispondere.

translation.en: Oh, okay. Uh, but the Gala?
Yes, I have another interview, and then I'll let you know my decision.
translation.it: Sì, ho un altro colloquio, dopodiché le farò sapere.

translation.en: Thank you.
Don, so good of you to get back to me.
Yes, I wanted to…
Hi.
Uh, how'd it go?
I don't know. Thanks for your help earlier.
translation.it: Non lo so, ma grazie per il tuo aiuto.

translation.en: Oh, I just walked in the kitchen. You put me to work.
translation.it: Ho solo eseguito i tuoi ordini.

translation.en: Look, I'm really sorry about that.
I hope I didn't throw you off your rhythm too much.
translation.it: Spero di non averti distratta troppo.

translation.en: I was just trying to be helpful.
You're not gonna tell your aunt what I said, are you?
translation.it: Non dirai niente a tua zia, vero?

translation.en: That she's, uh, difficult and impossible to please?
I didn't mean that. I never would've said that if I had known who you were.
translation.it: Non l'avrei mai detto, se avessi saputo chi eri.

translation.en: -I know. That's what everyone says. -[vehicle approaching]
translation.it: Lo so. È quello che dicono tutti.

translation.en: I better go. Your next interview's here.
translation.it: Vado. Il prossimo candidato è qui.

translation.en: Okay.
I've never met Taylor. I thought it was him.
I just can't believe it was her nephew.
translation.it: Non posso credere che fosse suo nipote.

translation.en: If he tells Jean what I said, we're definitely not getting the job.
translation.it: Se riferirà tutto a Jean, non otterremo mai il lavoro.

translation.en: I'm kinda curious now. So, you said his name was Carson?
translation.it: Ora sono curiosa. Hai detto che si chiama Carson?

translation.en: Yeah. What are you looking up?
Let's try this link.
Yeah, okay, so, "Since the Great Depression,
translation.it: Sì, ok, dunque: "Sin dalla Grande Depressione,

translation.en: generations of Harrison family members have given back to the community
translation.it: i membri della famiglia Harrison aiutano la comunità

translation.en: to help make a better future for all."
I didn't realize the foundation went back that far.
translation.it: Allora la Fondazione è molto antica.

translation.en: Huh. Here are photos from the Christmas Gala.
translation.it: Ecco delle foto del gala di Natale.

translation.en: That's him.
He's cute.
You can't tell me you didn't think he was attractive.
translation.it: Sul serio non l'hai trovato attraente?

translation.en: -I didn't notice. -Really?
translation.it: - Non ci ho fatto caso. - Davvero?

translation.en: Yes. I was focused on making a three-course meal.
translation.it: Sì. Ero concentrata sul menù di tre portate.

translation.en: Oh, okay. [laughs]
Don't worry, we'll hear from them soon.
Oh! Getting the Harrison Gala dinner would be huge.
translation.it: Questa cena è una grossa opportunità.

translation.en: -I need this job. -Yeah.
Here's to hoping.
We got this.
[Carson] Hi.
-Carson. -Am I disturbing you?
-Not at all. Come in. Sit down. -Thanks.
Where have you been hiding all evening?
I was just upstairs on the phone with my agent Isabella.
translation.it: Ero al telefono con la mia agente, Isabella.

translation.en: She's planning my next gig.
Is that right?
Don't worry, it's after Christmas.
Good.
That's good.
So… how did the interviews with the caterers go?
translation.it: Come sono andati i colloqui con i catering?

translation.en: They were both professional.
The food was fresh, delicious.
translation.it: Il cibo era fresco e delizioso.

translation.en: The platings and presentation were both excellent,
but I'm leaning toward the Bradford Bros.
-Uh… Why's that? -They've been in the business longer.
translation.it: - Perché? - Sono in attività da più tempo.

translation.en: They have more experience with dinners like this.
translation.it: Hanno più esperienza con cene come questa.

translation.en: I see.
You know…
I thought Molly's Menu Magic was impressive myself.
translation.it: Il Magico Menù di Molly mi ha davvero colpito.

translation.en: Really? Why do you say that?
-Well, I saw her in the kitchen-- -Molly?
translation.it: - Beh, l'ho vista in cucina… - Molly?

translation.en: Yes, Molly, in the kitchen, and I was impressed by her technique.
translation.it: Sì, Molly, in cucina, e sono rimasto colpito dalla sua tecnica.

translation.en: -Hmm. -Her attention to detail.
She made every little thing look perfect.
translation.it: Ha reso perfetta ogni piccola cosa.

translation.en: -I thought you would appreciate that. -Mm-hmm.
After all, experience doesn't always equal energy and enthusiasm.
translation.it: Dopotutto, esperienza non equivale sempre a energia ed entusiasmo.

translation.en: You may be right.
Molly's Menu Magic it is.
translation.it: Vada per Il Magico Menù di Molly.

translation.en: Good.
Carson, I am very happy to see you finally taking an interest in the Gala.
translation.it: Carson, sono felice di vedere che finalmente ti interessi al gala.

translation.en: Well, you know me, I'm happy to help when I'm in town.
translation.it: Mi conosci, mi piace aiutare, quando sono qui.

translation.en: Well then, here you go.
-What-- -Take over planning the dinner.
Aunt Jean, I've got no experience event planning.
translation.it: Io non ho esperienza nell'organizzazione di eventi.

translation.en: I just take the photographs.
You're smart, you know what to do.
translation.it: Sei un tipo sveglio, saprai cosa fare.

translation.en: I have faith in you.
What about Stephanie? She's normally your second in command.
translation.it: E Stephanie? È lei il tuo braccio destro.

translation.en: Your cousin has enough on her plate, plus a new baby,
translation.it: Tua cugina è impegnata col nuovo bambino

translation.en: and honestly, this year I'm just feeling… overwhelmed.
translation.it: e, sinceramente, quest'anno mi sento davvero sopraffatta.

translation.en: I can't do this by myself anymore.
translation.it: Non riesco più a fare tutto da sola.

translation.en: Okay.
I'll take over the dinner.
Thank you.
I will give Molly a call. You can take it from there.
translation.it: Io chiamerò Molly. Al resto penserai tu.

translation.en: All right.
Carson, you know how important this dinner is.
translation.it: Carson, sai bene quanto sia importante questa cena.

translation.en: Yes, I know.
But, Aunt Jean, this doesn't mean that I'm gonna be working
translation.it: Ma, zia Jean, questo non significa che lavorerò

translation.en: for the foundation full-time, okay?
translation.it: per la Fondazione a tempo pieno.

translation.en: Our focus will be on making this Christmas Gala the best that it can be.
translation.it: Ci concentreremo sulla buona riuscita di questo gala di Natale.

translation.en: We can discuss your future role at another time.
translation.it: Discuteremo del tuo futuro ruolo in un altro momento.

translation.en: -Leo. -Hey.
Hey.
Who are these for?
Oh, uh, Tammy. Bookstore.
Oh. Yeah, I'm prepping for the big art gallery holiday party tonight.
translation.it: Sì, io preparo per la grande festa di stasera alla galleria d'arte.

translation.en: It's gonna be like 200 people, you know?
Wow. That's great.
Yeah.
Have you heard from Jean Harrison?
Not yet, but, uh…
Look, she was swooning over our lobster gnocchi, so…
translation.it: È impazzita per i nostri gnocchi all'astice, perciò…

translation.en: I wouldn't hold my breath, no offense.
None taken. I'm sure it was divine.
-Here. Allow me. -Thanks.
Excuse me.
Molly Frost. Hello?
Yes. Okay.
That is fantastic. Thank you, Jean.
Yes, I will be there.
Thank you again.
I better go. I have a big gala to plan. Good luck with your party tonight.
translation.it: Scappo. Ho un gran gala da organizzare. Buona fortuna per stasera.

translation.en: Yes!
Welcome back, and congratulations.
Thanks. Uh, this is for Jean.
Walnut fudge.
Feel free to help yourself.
I'm not one for sweets, though I do enjoy a nice gingerbread every now and then.
translation.it: Non amo i dolci, sebbene mi conceda del pan di zenzero, di tanto in tanto.

translation.en: Please, come in.
Excuse me, Carson. Ms. Molly is here for the catering meeting.
translation.it: La sig.na Molly è qui per la riunione.

translation.en: It is good to see you again.
I thought I was meeting Jean.
Actually, Aunt Jean is letting me oversee the food this year.
translation.it: In realtà, zia Jean lascerà che supervisioni io la cena, quest'anno.

translation.en: -Oh. -I'll leave you two to it.
-Thank you. -Thank you, Robert.
We didn't officially meet the other day. I'm Carson.
translation.it: Non ci siamo presentati. Io sono Carson.

translation.en: -Uh, shall we get started? -Yes. Please have a seat.
Oh, those are cute.
Oh, yeah. My aunt collects them.
She's got, like, 200 in this house.
Wow, it's quite a collection.
-Can I get you anything to drink? -I'm fine. Thank you.
translation.it: - Vuoi qualcosa da bere? - Sono a posto. Grazie.

translation.en: Have you decided on a menu?
-Not yet. -What about the budget?
Uh… Does that matter?
It usually helps determine the menu options.
Well, then it's a very important question, I'll find out.
translation.it: Allora è decisamente importante. Lo scoprirò.

translation.en: To give me an idea, what did you serve last year?
Prime rib and, uh…
No, uh, chicken and fish, I think,
and a lot of tiny little puffy, fancy things.
translation.it: e piccoli antipasti tondi e raffinati.

translation.en: Buffet or seated dinner?
Look, the truth is, I've been to every single one of these Galas
translation.it: La verità è che partecipo a questo gala

translation.en: since I was five years old, and they're all kind of running together.
translation.it: da quando avevo cinque anni e confondo i ricordi.

translation.en: Okay, how many people are you expecting?
I will have to get back to you on that too.
What about the venue? The dinner space?
What about it?
-Where's dinner happening? -It's the same place every year.
translation.it: - Dove si terrà la cena? - Sempre nel solito posto.

translation.en: Which is where?
It's the living room, but they use it for entertaining.
translation.it: È il salotto, ma lo usano per gli eventi.

translation.en: Oh, do you wanna have a look yourself?
-Yeah, that would be helpful. -Good.
Uh, it's back upstairs.
Okay, here it is.
Um… We're gonna have all the furniture moved out and we're gonna have tables brought in.
translation.it: Faremo portare via tutti i mobili e sistemeremo i tavoli.

translation.en: It's beautiful.
I hear your Gala is the Christmas party of the year.
translation.it: So che è il gala di Natale dell'anno.

translation.en: Yeah. I suppose it is.
The dinner doubles as a fundraiser for the foundation.
translation.it: Funge anche da raccolta fondi per la Fondazione.

translation.en: Essentially, it's another day in the office, just with fancier food.
translation.it: È un'altra giornata di lavoro, ma con cibo più raffinato.

translation.en: Maybe we can change that with the menu.
translation.it: Forse questo può cambiare, grazie al menù.

translation.en: Holiday traditions unite family and friends.
translation.it: Le tradizioni uniscono famiglia e amici.

translation.en: Food brings back memories, brings people together.
translation.it: Il cibo fa riaffiorare i ricordi e unisce la gente.

translation.en: I like that.
Food is more than just food. Exactly.
translation.it: - Il cibo è più di un semplice alimento. - Esatto.

translation.en: So we don't know the menu, budget, or number of people?
translation.it: Quindi non sappiamo niente di niente?

translation.en: Nope. But we do know the date: December 23rd.
translation.it: No, ma conosciamo la data: il 23 dicembre.

translation.en: Oh, well, that's something.
He was gonna get more details and get back to us. We need more icing.
translation.it: Ha detto che ci farà sapere. Serve più zucchero a velo.

translation.en: -There's more in the back. I'll get it. -Okay.
translation.it: - Vado a prenderlo dal retro. - Ok.

translation.en: -Come in. -Hey.
Rough afternoon?
-Occupational hazard. -Ah.
Moll, I don't think we have any…
translation.it: Moll, non credo che ci sia altro…

translation.en: Oh, this is Christina.
-Hi. -You must be Carson.
Hi. I've heard so much about you.
translation.it: Ho sentito tanto parlare di te.

translation.en: I'm flattered, I think.
We are beyond honored to be catering your foundation's Christmas Gala dinner.
translation.it: Siamo onorate di fornire il catering per il gala della vostra fondazione.

translation.en: Harrison family, legendary.
Thanks for saying that.
Do you want something to drink or, or eat, or…
translation.it: Vuoi qualcosa da bere, da mangiare o…

translation.en: -Actually, we need more icing? -Oh, no. I'm good. Thanks, though.
translation.it: - E lo zucchero a velo? - No. Sono a posto. Grazie.

translation.en: -Um, yeah, I'll-- -Good to meet you, Christina.
translation.it: - Sì, vado a… - È stato un piacere.

translation.en: You too.
-So… -So…
You first.
-Do you have any more information? -Uh, yes.
So, we are expecting 25 guests, approximately.
Okay. Budget?
The high end.
-Menu? -Now that is TBD.
translation.it: - Il menù? - Quello è ancora da definire.

translation.en: I thought we could discuss it over peppermint hot chocolate, my treat.
translation.it: Ti offro una cioccolata calda alla menta e ne parliamo.

translation.en: -I don't really-- -Strictly professional.
translation.it: - Non credo che… - È solo per lavoro.

translation.en: It's my guilty pleasure when I'm in town.
translation.it: È il mio vizio quando sono qui.

translation.en: Sure. I'll grab my coat and clean up.
translation.it: Certo. Prendo il cappotto e mi do una ripulita.

translation.en: -Thanks. -You're welcome.
-You've had one of these before? -Yes.
Every year since I was a kid.
translation.it: Ogni anno, da quando ero piccola.

translation.en: -Well, then you know. -[both laugh]
I wait all year for this.
[laughs] Where are you the rest of the year? Everywhere and nowhere.
translation.it: - Dove stai il resto dell'anno? - Un po' dappertutto.

translation.en: I'm an event photographer.
Interesting.
Do you work for a particular magazine?
translation.it: Lavori per una rivista in particolare?

translation.en: No, I freelance.
My agent finds me work all over.
translation.it: La mia agente mi trova ingaggi in tutto il mondo.

translation.en: One day, it's a fashion show in Paris,
translation.it: Un giorno, è una sfilata a Parigi,

translation.en: the next it's an engagement party on a yacht in Ibiza,
translation.it: quello dopo, una festa di fidanzamento su uno yacht a Ibiza

translation.en: then it's a product tech launch party in Silicon Valley.
translation.it: o il lancio di un prodotto tecnologico nella Silicon Valley.

translation.en: Blah, blah, blah.
No, it sounds glamorous.
Trust me, it's far from glamorous.
It's long hours, and I'm never in the same place for more than a week.
translation.it: È estenuante e non resto mai in un posto per più di una settimana.

translation.en: So maintaining friendships… it can be difficult.
translation.it: Coltivare i rapporti può essere dura.

translation.en: Yeah, that would be hard.
So how did you get into event photography?
translation.it: Come sei entrato in questo mondo?

translation.en: Uh, it started as a favor for a friend's graduation party,
translation.it: È iniziato come un favore per la laurea di un amico

translation.en: and then it grew from there.
But I… I really love nature photography.
I wanna do more of that, but it doesn't really pay well.
translation.it: Vorrei dedicarmi a quello, ma non rende molto.

translation.en: There's not a lot of work.
Oh, speaking of work, I had some ideas I wanted to show you.
translation.it: A proposito di lavoro, ho delle idee da proporti.

translation.en: Yeah, bring it on.
Okay.
For the hors d'oeuvres, I have a few options.
translation.it: Per gli antipasti, ho varie opzioni.

translation.en: So, these are the mini-pesto and goat cheese appetizers.
translation.it: Questi sono i mini stuzzichini al pesto e formaggio di capra.

translation.en: Wow, they look great.
-[Carson] Yeah, can I? -Yeah.
[Carson] Yeah, everything looks great. That's…
Truth is, this isn't really my area of expertise.
translation.it: La verità è che questa non è la mia area di competenza.

translation.en: -I figured as much. -Yeah.
I'm just gonna mess this up.
You're the expert. I trust you.
translation.it: Sei tu l'esperta. Mi fido di te.

translation.en: What about Jean?
Well, don't worry. I'm gonna tell her I approve your menu choices, which I do.
translation.it: Tranquilla. Le dirò che approvo le tue scelte, il che è vero.

translation.en: Okay, that was easy.
Oh, and feel free to use our kitchen.
translation.it: E usa pure la nostra cucina.

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate that.
-That's it? You're leaving? -Yeah, I have a lot of work to do.
translation.it: - Tutto qui? Te ne vai? - Sì, ho molto lavoro da fare.

translation.en: Thank you for the peppermint hot chocolate.
translation.it: Grazie per la cioccolata alla menta.

translation.en: [Carson] You're welcome.
-Bye. -[Molly] Bye.
Oh, careful with the decorations.
Thanks, just put them over there, and we'll arrange them later.
translation.it: Grazie, metteteli lì, li sistemeremo più tardi.

translation.en: Hi. Do you need a hand?
I think everything is almost in.
translation.it: Penso che ci sia quasi tutto.

translation.en: How did it go with the caterers?
Oh, good. Yeah, she has fantastic ideas.
translation.it: Bene. Sì, ha delle idee fantastiche.

translation.en: We will need at least five different types of cocktail appetizers,
translation.it: Serviranno almeno cinque tipi di stuzzichini da cocktail

translation.en: including a vegetarian option for our newest board member, Anne.
translation.it: e un'opzione vegetariana per la nostra nuova socia, Anne.

translation.en: I will let her know.
Aunt Jean, look, I don't want you to worry about anything.
translation.it: Zia Jean, ascolta, non voglio che ti preoccupi di nulla.

translation.en: I promise, it's gonna be fantastic.
Oh, regards to Molly.
It was good.
But it was not my Grandfather Fred's Christmas fudge.
translation.it: ma non era il caramello di Natale di mio nonno Fred.

translation.en: -What about his Christmas fudge? -Did I never tell you this?
translation.it: - Quale caramello? - Non te l'ho mai detto?

translation.en: Your great grandfather worked long hours,
but every year before Christmas, he would take off a day
translation.it: ma ogni Natale si prendeva un giorno

translation.en: to make his Christmas walnut fudge for all us kids.
translation.it: per preparare il suo caramello alle noci per noi bambini.

translation.en: He lived in York County, Maine, then.
translation.it: Allora viveva nella Contea di York, nel Maine.

translation.en: I never knew that.
Whenever my parents weren't looking,
Grandpa would sneak extra fudge to all us kids.
translation.it: il nonno ci dava di nascosto del caramello in più.

translation.en: Just thinking about it brings back the fondest memories of my childhood.
translation.it: Mi riporta alla mente i ricordi più belli della mia infanzia.

translation.en: Well, 'cause food can be more than just food.
translation.it: Perché il cibo non è solo cibo.

translation.en: Yes, it really can be.
The art dealer called.
The three paintings he's been holding for us have sold.
translation.it: Ha venduto i tre quadri che teneva da parte per noi.

translation.en: Uh, the paintings you were gonna auction off at the Gala?
translation.it: I quadri per l'asta del gala?

translation.en: Well, I won't be using that gallery again.
translation.it: Beh, non mi affiderò più a loro.

translation.en: He apologizes for the inconvenience
and hopes you'll find something else for the fundraiser.
translation.it: e spera che troverai qualcos'altro per l'asta.

translation.en: As much as I love the Christmas Gala,
translation.it: Per quanto ami il gala di Natale,

translation.en: I am not going to miss dealing with all of this when I retire.
translation.it: non mi mancherà avere a che fare con tutto questo, quando sarò in pensione.

translation.en: I'll have to call Don, the president of our board.
translation.it: Devo chiamare Don, il presidente del nostro Consiglio.

translation.en: Robert, you always anticipate my needs.
translation.it: Robert, anticipi sempre i miei bisogni.

translation.en: Excuse me.
-She's retiring? -Not yet.
But she's been thinking a lot about it lately.
Wow.
No one is gonna come close to filling her shoes.
translation.it: Nessuno potrà mai prendere il suo posto.

translation.en: Especially me, Robert.
I'll see you later.
-Morning. -Hi.
I thought I'd take you up on your offer to use the kitchen, if the chef doesn't mind.
translation.it: Accetto la tua offerta di usare la cucina, se allo chef non dispiace.

translation.en: No, not at all.
My aunt had someone leave meals in the fridge for the rest of the day.
translation.it: Mia zia si è fatta lasciare i pasti di oggi in frigo.

translation.en: That's efficient.
She's surprisingly low maintenance when it comes to herself.
translation.it: È poco esigente, quando si tratta di se stessa.

translation.en: -I never said-- -I'm giving you a hard time.
-Can I grab something for you? -Yeah, that'd be great. Thank you.
translation.it: - Ti aiuto? - Sì, te ne sarei grata. Grazie.

translation.en: Sorry. I…
It's in the back seat.
Okay.
You're right about food bringing back memories.
translation.it: È vero che il cibo richiama i ricordi.

translation.en: I was talking to my Aunt Jean last night and she was…
translation.it: Ieri sera parlavo con zia Jean.

translation.en: she was telling me about her childhood, and apparently,
translation.it: Mi ha raccontato della sua infanzia ed è venuto fuori

translation.en: my family is from York County, Maine.
translation.it: che siamo della Contea di York, nel Maine.

translation.en: Maine. Really? That's cool.
Did she say anything about the fudge?
She liked it, and she appreciated you tried.
translation.it: Le è piaciuto e apprezza i tuoi sforzi.

translation.en: I have more recipes.
That's really sweet of you, literally. But, uh, you don't have to go to the trouble.
translation.it: È dolce da parte tua, in tutti i sensi, ma non serve che ti disturbi.

translation.en: -Feels like a challenge now. -Then I wish you good luck.
translation.it: - È diventata una sfida. - Allora, buona fortuna.

translation.en: So, what are we making today?
Holiday cheesecake bars and almond sugar cookies.
translation.it: Barrette di cheescake e biscotti alle mandorle.

translation.en: Put me to work, if you dare.
Are your hands clean?
Thank you anyway. I appreciate your getting back to me.
translation.it: Grazie lo stesso per avermi richiamata.

translation.en: And season's greetings to you too.
translation.it: E auguri di buone feste anche a lei.

translation.en: I take it that wasn't good news.
Unfortunately, no, it wasn't.
Sorry to hear that.
I am having zero luck.
Everyone has already donated their big-ticket items for the holiday season.
translation.it: Tutti hanno già donato i loro articoli più costosi.

translation.en: -Something will turn up. -I hope so.
-What have you got there? -Oh, it just arrived.
translation.it: - Che cos'hai lì? - È appena arrivato.

translation.en: It's from the children at the Harrison Community Center.
translation.it: È da parte dei bambini del Centro Harrison.

translation.en: Perhaps it'll cheer you up.
-[Jean] Aww! -[Robert laughs]
This is why we do what we do, Robert.
translation.it: È per questo che lo facciamo.

translation.en: This makes it all worthwhile.
-I'll have it framed for you, if you like. -Thank you.
translation.it: - Posso farlo incorniciare, se vuoi. - Grazie.

translation.en: Oh, by the way, have you seen Carson?
I've seen not hide nor hair of him all day.
translation.it: Non l'ho visto per tutto il giorno.

translation.en: He is in the kitchen helping the caterer bake Christmas cookies.
translation.it: È in cucina che aiuta la chef a preparare i biscotti di Natale.

translation.en: He's baking?
There's a first for everything.
translation.it: C'è una prima volta per tutto.

translation.en: Well, I'm glad he's taking this seriously.
translation.it: Sono contenta che stia prendendo sul serio questa cosa.

translation.en: Maybe it will help him see how much the foundation means.
translation.it: Forse lo aiuterà a capire quanto sia importante la Fondazione.

translation.en: Hopefully.
Hope you didn't have to cancel any Christmas plans to do the Gala.
translation.it: Spero tu non abbia disdetto i tuoi piani.

translation.en: -My family did go on holiday without me. -What?
translation.it: - La mia famiglia è partita senza di me. - Cosa?

translation.en: They went without you?
Yeah, but I needed to stay in town.
translation.it: Sì, io dovevo restare in città.

translation.en: Making Molly's Menu Magic a success is my number-one priority right now.
translation.it: Far decollare Il Magico Menù di Molly è la mia priorità, in questo momento.

translation.en: And your significant other?
My significant other is business right now.
translation.it: Per ora, la mia dolce metà è il lavoro.

translation.en: Well, I can relate to that.
-Are you close with your family? -Yeah.
translation.it: - La tua famiglia è unita? - Sì.

translation.en: My parents are still very much in love after all these years.
translation.it: Dopo tanti anni, i miei sono ancora molto innamorati.

translation.en: You're lucky.
You're lucky too, you're part of the famous Harrison family.
translation.it: Anche tu, sei della famosa famiglia Harrison.

translation.en: -You're like a local celebrity. -Yeah.
I think they think of me as the rebel of the family, though.
translation.it: Penso mi vedano come il ribelle della famiglia.

translation.en: -Why is that? -You know, can you…
Braiding cookies is kind of complicated. [laughs]
-Can you give me a hand? -You've almost got it.
translation.it: - Puoi darmi una mano? - Stai andando bene.

translation.en: -Wow, I don't know. -Here. Okay.
-The left goes over the middle. -Mm-hmm.
translation.it: La striscia di sinistra va al centro.

translation.en: And then the right goes over the middle.
-Try not to flatten the dough. -Right.
-There you go. -Kinda like that?
Yeah.
-Okay. -Perfect.
-And then you bend the top. -Like that?
It's a tri-color candy cane. You're a genius.
translation.it: È un bastoncino di zucchero tricolore. Sei un genio.

translation.en: Well, not quite, but I'll take it.
Hey, I saw that.
No, I said you're a genius. Mm, these are really good.
translation.it: No, sul serio, sei un genio. Sono davvero buoni.

translation.en: I see what you're doing. Your charm will not work on me.
translation.it: So cosa fai. Il tuo fascino non attacca con me.

translation.en: You think I'm charming?
-I'm not gonna tell you what I think. -Okay, I won't ask then.
translation.it: - Non ti dirò cosa penso. - Ok, allora non chiedo.

translation.en: -What's next? -Okay.
That goes on the tray, and then we'll sprinkle it with my super secret cookie seasoning.
translation.it: Lo mettiamo sul vassoio e lo cospargiamo col mio ingrediente super segreto.

translation.en: Super secret, do tell?
The secret is in the blend, and that I will never tell.
translation.it: Il segreto è nella miscela e non lo rivelerò mai.

translation.en: -I'll get it out of you somehow. -No, never.
translation.it: - Riuscirò a farti parlare. - No, mai.

translation.en: It's empty.
I'll refill.
Christina used the rest, and this was the last container.
translation.it: Christina l'ha finito ed era l'ultimo barattolo.

translation.en: Can you make more?
Yeah, but I'll have to go to the countryside.
translation.it: Sì, ma dovrò andare in campagna.

translation.en: -If I leave now, I might have time. -I'll get my keys.
translation.it: - Se parto subito, potrei farcela. - Prendo le chiavi.

translation.en: I'm sure you're busy. I could have driven myself.
translation.it: Sarai molto impegnato. Potevo andare da sola.

translation.en: It's no problem. I love a new adventure.
Is that what makes you the outsider of the family?
translation.it: Per questo sei il ribelle della famiglia?

translation.en: [chuckles] Probably.
You and your aunt seem close. Oh, we are.
translation.it: - Tu e tua zia sembrate uniti. - Lo siamo.

translation.en: Aunt Jean never had children of her own,
translation.it: Zia Jean non ha mai avuto figli,

translation.en: but she always treated me like I was her son.
translation.it: ma mi ha sempre trattato come tale.

translation.en: -It's nice that you have each other. -Yeah.
translation.it: - È bello che abbiate l'un l'altro. - Sì.

translation.en: Yeah, it is.
Though, sometimes I think she wishes I was more like my cousins.
translation.it: Ma vorrebbe che fossi più come i miei cugini.

translation.en: They all went to Ivy League Schools, earned their MBAs, work for the foundation.
translation.it: Sono andati in università prestigiose, lavorano per la Fondazione…

translation.en: I imagine it would be hard not having separation
translation.it: Immagino sia dura quando non c'è un confine

translation.en: between family and the family business.
translation.it: tra la famiglia e gli affari di famiglia.

translation.en: Yeah, especially when you're a Harrison.
translation.it: Già, specialmente quando sei un Harrison.

translation.en: Professionally, I go by Jacob, my middle name.
translation.it: Al lavoro, uso il mio secondo nome: Jacob.

translation.en: Makes it easier.
The Harrison name is so renowned. Doesn't it make you proud?
translation.it: Il nome degli Harrison è rinomato. Non ne vai fiero?

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
Yeah, I'm really proud.
But… when people find out you're a Harrison, they treat you differently.
translation.it: Ma quando scoprono che sei un Harrison, ti trattano diversamente.

translation.en: That's partly why I didn't tell you who I was when I met you in the kitchen.
translation.it: Per questo non ti ho detto chi ero quando ci siamo conosciuti.

translation.en: I wonder what you would have done if you knew who I was.
-I would have kicked you out. -[laughs]
Fair enough.
We need to make a quick detour.
Wow, how did you know this was here?
Well, I drove past it the other day.
translation.it: Ci sono passato davanti l'altro giorno.

translation.en: So did I. I never saw it.
It's beautiful.
Yeah. Yeah, it is.
Sometimes it's nice to just slow down.
I worry about the future so much,
translation.it: Mi preoccupo così tanto del futuro

translation.en: I have to remind myself to just be here in the present moment.
translation.it: che devo ricordare a me stesso di vivere il momento presente.

translation.en: It's one of the first things to learn about photography,
translation.it: È una delle prime lezioni sulla fotografia:

translation.en: to just stop and look so I could really see.
translation.it: fermarsi a osservare per vedere davvero.

translation.en: It's actually good advice.
Sometimes I'm so focused on building my career, I forget why I got into it in the first place.
translation.it: A volte sono così presa dalla mia carriera che dimentico perché ho iniziato.

translation.en: Why did you?
For my love of food, and bringing people together.
translation.it: Perché amo il cibo e unire le persone.

translation.en: That's nice.
May I?
Uh… sure.
Beautiful.
What did you say?
Nothing, it's just a beautiful day.
translation.it: Niente, che è una bellissima giornata.

translation.en: -Thomas! -[Thomas laughs]
-Hi. -You made it.
-It's nice to see you. -You too.
-Who is your friend? -This is Carson.
translation.it: - Chi è il tuo amico? - Lui è Carson.

translation.en: Thomas is an old friend and veteran.
translation.it: Thomas è un vecchio amico e un veterano.

translation.en: It's very good to meet you, sir, and thank you for your service.
translation.it: Piacere, signore, e grazie per il suo servizio.

translation.en: Appreciate it. Just working on your order.
translation.it: Grazie. Sto preparando il tuo ordine.

translation.en: -I'll ring the bell when it's ready. -Great.
Sir, do you mind if I take some photographs of your property?
translation.it: Posso scattare qualche foto della sua proprietà?

translation.en: He's a professional photographer.
Sure. Go ahead. Anything but the shed.
translation.it: Certo. Fa' pure. Eccetto il capanno.

translation.en: -It's a mess. -Fair enough.
-Do you need any help? -No, I got it.
translation.it: - Hai bisogno di aiuto? - No, ce la faccio.

translation.en: You might keep an eye on your young man, make sure he doesn't wander too far.
translation.it: Assicurati che il tuo ragazzo non si allontani troppo.

translation.en: Oh, no, no. We're not together. He's an employer.
translation.it: No. Non stiamo insieme. È un mio cliente.

translation.en: Oh, all right, then. All right.
-Thanks. -See you in a bit.
Hey.
It's so beautiful here, especially during Christmas.
translation.it: Questo posto è splendido, specialmente a Natale.

translation.en: Yeah. It really is.
-So how do you know Thomas? -We always got our Christmas tree here.
translation.it: - Come conosci Thomas? - Compravamo l'albero qui.

translation.en: His wife used to run the farmer's market in the village.
translation.it: Sua moglie gestiva il mercato contadino della città.

translation.en: When she passed, he got rid of the shop,
and now he sells everything from his house.
translation.it: e ora vende tutto da casa sua.

translation.en: -Well, he seems like a really nice guy. -He is.
translation.it: - Sembra davvero un brav'uomo. - Lo è.

translation.en: And you will not find better spices or herbs anywhere,
translation.it: E non troverai spezie o erbe migliori da nessuna parte.

translation.en: or Christmas trees.
Yeah, they are… they're really beautiful.
-That looks complicated. -Uh…
It takes some getting used to, for sure, um…
But I have another camera. Wanna take some photos?
translation.it: Ma ho un'altra fotocamera. Vuoi scattare qualche foto?

translation.en: -Uh, sure. -Yeah.
"On," point, shoot, easy.
translation.it: Accendi, punta e scatta. È facile.

translation.en: How did I do?
It's actually really good. You got an eye for this. You're an artist after all.
translation.it: È venuta bene. Hai talento. Dopotutto, sei un'artista.

translation.en: Well, food can be artistic, but I wouldn't necessarily call it art.
translation.it: Il cibo può essere artistico, ma non lo chiamerei arte.

translation.en: Well, it incorporates all of the senses.
Okay, I'll give you that.
Not to mention the plating and presentation aspects.
translation.it: Per non parlare di impiattamento e presentazione.

translation.en: Wow. You know more about catering than you've let on.
translation.it: Wow. Ne sai più di quanto dai a vedere.

translation.en: I might have done a little bit of research this week.
I'm impressed.
-Good. -[triangle clanging]
That's probably us. We should probably head back.
translation.it: Deve essere per noi. Faremmo meglio a tornare indietro.

translation.en: Yeah, let's do it.
Lead the way.
-Hope you got some good pictures. -Oh, I did.
translation.it: - Spero che tu abbia fatto belle foto. - È cosi.

translation.en: In fact, uh, when I print them out, would you like some copies?
translation.it: Quando le stampo, ne vuole qualche copia?

translation.en: I'd like that.
-How much do I owe you? -I got this.
translation.it: - Quanto ti devo? - Ci penso io.

translation.en: It's okay, I can get it.
No, it's for the Gala. And this way I know you won't up-charge me.
translation.it: No, è per il gala. E così mi assicuro che non mi farai pagare di più.

translation.en: Uh, no change necessary, sir. Merry Christmas.
translation.it: Tenga pure il resto. Buon Natale.

translation.en: Well, that's mighty generous of you.
translation.it: Beh, è molto generoso da parte tua.

translation.en: Merry Christmas to you both.
-Let me take this to the car. -Sure.
-Your employer, you say? -Yep.
translation.it: - Un tuo cliente, hai detto? - Già.

translation.en: So my aunt was just telling me that the Harrison Foundation holds
translation.it: Mia zia mi ha detto che la Fondazione Harrison organizza

translation.en: events every week in town for veterans.
-You don't say? -Yeah. Yeah.
That's her card.
There's meals, entertainment, and they got a holiday festival coming up.
translation.it: C'è cibo, intrattenimento e presto ci sarà un festival di Natale.

translation.en: Should check it out. They'd love your company.
I might just do that.
Happy holidays, Thomas.
Thanks, guys. Bye-bye.
-Thank you. -Bye.
What?
You might be a better ambassador for your family's foundation than you think.
translation.it: Saresti un ambasciatore migliore di quanto credi per la Fondazione.

translation.en: Sounds like you and Carson had fun.
Surprisingly, it was a lot of fun.
Is he single? It's strictly a professional relationship.
translation.it: - È single? - È un rapporto puramente professionale.

translation.en: Even if I was interested, which I'm not, he lives his life out of a suitcase.
translation.it: Anche se fossi interessata, e non lo sono, lui non c'è mai.

translation.en: So? People make long-distance relationships work all the time.
translation.it: Non sareste i primi a far funzionare una relazione a distanza.

translation.en: Okay, but if you're not on the same page, or in the same place,
translation.it: Ok, ma se non si è in sintonia o nello stesso posto,

translation.en: it can only end in heartbreak.
Hey, Carson isn't Phil, okay?
translation.it: Ehi, Carson non è Phil, ok?

translation.en: He's not gonna string you along with empty promises.
translation.it: Non ti abbindolerà con promesse vuote.

translation.en: I know, but I'm not willing to make the same mistake twice.
translation.it: Lo so, ma non ho intenzione di ripetere lo stesso errore.

translation.en: There's no point in getting involved if there's no future.
translation.it: Non ha senso provarci se non c'è futuro.

translation.en: Besides, we have nothing in common.
Why would you say that?
He is a trust fund baby, and I've been working since I was 15.
translation.it: Lui è un ricco ereditiere, mentre io lavoro da quando avevo 15 anni.

translation.en: If I fail, I lose everything. There's no safety net.
translation.it: Se fallisco, perdo tutto. Non ho una rete di sicurezza.

translation.en: Uh, we're not going to fail.
This Gala is going to be the making of Molly's Menu Magic.
translation.it: Questo gala segnerà il successo del Magico Menù di Molly.

translation.en: That is the goal.
Tomorrow we're prepping the main courses.
Oh, did you hear that the Bradford Bros. snagged City Hall's New Year's Eve party?
translation.it: Sai che Bradford Bros. si è accaparrata la festa di Capodanno del Municipio?

translation.en: Yes. All the more reason this has to go perfectly.
translation.it: Sì. Un motivo in più perché sia tutto perfetto.

translation.en: Aren't you coming?
I found a new fudge recipe I wanna try.
translation.it: Ho una nuova ricetta del caramello.

translation.en: -Is it for Jean, again? -Yes.
translation.it: - È per Jean, di nuovo? - Sì.

translation.en: Even if I have to attempt it a hundred times, I will get it right.
translation.it: Riuscirò a ricrearla, dovessi provarci cento volte.

translation.en: Well, I really hope it doesn't take that many times.
translation.it: Beh, spero che non ce ne vogliano così tante.

translation.en: Good luck.
-Thanks. I'll see you in the morning. -Good night.
Molly, hello. What can I do for you?
translation.it: Molly, salve. Cosa posso fare per lei?

translation.en: I have something for you to try.
translation.it: Ho una cosa da farle provare.

translation.en: You are so kind continuing to attempt to re-create it.
translation.it: È davvero gentile a continuare a tentare di ricrearla.

translation.en: This time I used an old-fashioned recipe using brown sugar.
translation.it: Ho usato una vecchia ricetta con lo zucchero di canna.

translation.en: Go ahead and take a piece.
Here's hoping.
What do you think?
It's delicious, but it's not my grandfather's.
translation.it: È delizioso, ma non è quello di mio nonno.

translation.en: I'll keep trying to make it work. Maybe it's the cocoa powder.
translation.it: Continuerò a provarci. Forse è il cacao in polvere.

translation.en: Your time is valuable.
You don't need to waste any more of it
translation.it: Non serve che continui a sprecarlo

translation.en: on further fruitless attempts to please me.
translation.it: in ulteriori vani tentativi per compiacermi.

translation.en: I don't mind.
I have news.
I can tell by the look on your face that it isn't good.
translation.it: A giudicare dalla tua espressione, non sono buone.

translation.en: What is it this time? Molly, please, wait.
Pierre phoned.
He wishes he could help, and he apologizes,
translation.it: Vorrebbe poter aiutare e si scusa,

translation.en: but the sculpture won't be ready until after the Gala.
translation.it: ma non ultimerà la scultura in tempo.

translation.en: There goes that idea.
Robert, do you still have the number for that antique restorer?
translation.it: Robert, hai ancora il numero di quella restauratrice di antiquariato?

translation.en: -Sarah? -Sutton.
-Sutton Paige? -Yes, that's the one.
Perhaps she has some antiques she would donate.
translation.it: Forse ha qualche oggetto antico da donare.

translation.en: -I'll get it right away. -Thank you.
Now, Molly, Carson showed me your menu this morning.
translation.it: Tornando a noi, Molly, Carson mi ha mostrato il suo menù.

translation.en: I hope he's being helpful.
Yes, very helpful.
Good. This is the first time that he's participated
translation.it: Bene. È la prima volta che collabora

translation.en: in any of our foundation's events, so I'm glad to hear it.
translation.it: a un evento della Fondazione, perciò mi fa piacere sentirlo.

translation.en: I have made some changes to the menu.
translation.it: Ho apportato dei cambiamenti al menù.

translation.en: Oh, right, of course.
No problem at all.
Wonderful.
We have a problem.
Jean would like beef Wellington instead of the prime rib entrée.
translation.it: Jean vuole il filetto alla Wellington al posto della costata.

translation.en: Nix the ricotta meatballs. We can use them for the McCue lunch?
translation.it: Niente polpette di ricotta. Le serviremo ai McCue.

translation.en: She saw the candy cane dessert and would prefer we do not serve those because they do not look professional.
translation.it: E preferirebbe non servire i biscotti perché non li trova professionali.

translation.en: I mean, they haven't even been baked or decorated yet.
translation.it: Non sono ancora stati cotti né decorati.

translation.en: -[sighs] She's something else. -Who's something else?
I'll call you back.
Hi. Sorry to interrupt.
Uh… I thought you approved the menu.
Oh, I did. Why?
I'll talk to her. She put me in charge, she needs to trust me.
translation.it: Le parlerò. Mi ha messo al comando, deve fidarsi di me.

translation.en: No, I don't wanna cause any trouble. I'll do whatever she wants.
translation.it: No, non voglio creare problemi. Farò tutto ciò che vuole.

translation.en: It's fine.
I don't know why the menu's such a big deal anyway.
translation.it: Non capisco che differenza faccia il menù.

translation.en: Everyone's gonna love whatever delicious entrée you make.
translation.it: La gente adorerà qualsiasi cosa cucinerai.

translation.en: And I didn't spend all that time braiding those cookies not to serve them.
translation.it: E non ho passato ore a intrecciare biscotti per non servirli.

translation.en: -Seriously, don't worry about it. -No.
I don't think you understand.
This dinner and Jean Harrison's opinion, it can make or break my career.
translation.it: La mia carriera dipende da questa cena e dall'opinione di Jean.

translation.en: I love my aunt.
translation.it: Io voglio bene a mia zia,

translation.en: But she runs one wonderful but, in the grand scheme of things,
translation.it: ma gestisce una fondazione che, seppur magnifica,

translation.en: relatively small foundation.
I don't know why people make a big deal of one person's opinion, to be honest.
translation.it: Non capisco perché la gente dia tanto peso alla sua opinione.

translation.en: Okay, I know you grew up with it, but do you know anything about your family's foundation?
translation.it: Ok, so che è la Fondazione della tua famiglia, ma la conosci davvero?

translation.en: Well… Just…
Come with me.
Where are we going?
You'll see. This time, you have to trust me.

translation.en: -All right, but I'm driving. -Fine, my car's a mess.

translation.en: I'll get my coat!
At some point, you are gonna have to tell me where we're going.
The Harrison Community Center. Have you been recently?

translation.en: You know, I don't think I've ever been inside.
Really?
Well, that answer is about to change.

translation.en: I spent many, many hours here as a kid.

translation.en: You did?
[Molly] Ahh! I love your costume!
-Christmas ballerina! -Wow!
Excellent twirling. Very well done.
So, all the kids here, it's just for the holiday,

The Harrison Community Center offers after-school, weekend, holiday care for all kids.
translation.it: Il Centro offre attività doposcuola, nei weekend e festivi per i bambini.

translation.en: Everyone's welcome, and it's free.
translation.it: Sono tutti benvenuti ed è gratis.

translation.en: Wow, they are so creative.
You mind if I help? Need a hand?

translation.en: Hold it there.
And then you can, with the other hand, grab that.

translation.en: Nice!
This is actually where I learned about royal icing and piping techniques.

translation.en: -You learned that here? -Mm-hmm.
Ms. Zona was the wonderful cookie teacher who taught us.
She was the best. She's the reason why I became a baker.
translation.it: Era la migliore. È il motivo per cui faccio la cuoca.

translation.en: Hi, Molly. [laughs]
Amber runs Bendell Bakery, and she volunteers here on her days off.

translation.en: -Hi, Amber. -Hi.
Well, Molly and I, we switch off weekends.
But she hosts a cooking class for the kids in her very own kitchen.
translation.it: Ma lei tiene un corso di cucina per i bambini nel suo stesso laboratorio.

translation.en: She's pretty fantastic.
-Yes, she is. -Mm-hmm.
I'll be right back.
Growing up, both my parents worked,
so my brothers and I spent almost every day here.
translation.it: e io e i miei fratelli venivamo qui quasi tutti i giorni.

translation.en: The money they saved helped put us through college.
translation.it: Coi soldi risparmiati, siamo andati al college.

translation.en: Wow.
I really am so grateful to your family.
translation.it: Sono molto grata alla tua famiglia.

translation.en: We all are.
Thank you for sharing that with me.
Whoa. Oh! Sorry.
Hey, Stephen would like to give you something.
Would you like a Christmas cookie?
Uh, don't mind if I do.
Can I take that one? Oh, thank you.
Did you ice these? Are you sure? They look professionally decorated.

translation.en: Yes, I'm sure.
Wow. That…
That is one of the best Christmas cookies I've ever had, young man.

translation.en: And the icing is perfect.
I've been decorating cookies since I was a little kid.
translation.it: Decoro biscotti da quando ero piccolo.

translation.en: Well, you keep up the good work, the great work.
I… I didn't catch your name.
translation.it: Non ho afferrato il tuo nome.

translation.en: -It's Carson. -Carson?
-As in a Harrison? -Mm-hmm.
I can't begin to tell you how thankful we all are to your family

translation.en: for everything that they've done for the town!
translation.it: per tutto quello che ha fatto!

translation.en: From the center, to the arts program in the school.

translation.en: Well… really, for everything. Your family is the best!
translation.it: Beh, davvero per tutto. Siete i migliori!

translation.en: -I mean, I could go on and on. -Thanks.
-Thanks. -Okay, well, I should…
Okay.
Come back again soon!
-Yeah! -Merry Christmas!
-Bye! -Merry Christmas!
-Happy holidays. -Bye.
-Thank you very much. -Okay.
Come again.
And that is what happens when people find out I'm a Harrison around here.
translation.it: Ecco cosa accade quando scoprono che sono un Harrison.

translation.en: This isn't about you, it's about the Harrison Foundation,
translation.it: Non riguarda te, ma la Fondazione Harrison

translation.en: all the good they do for so many kids.
translation.it: e tutto il bene che fa.

translation.en: No, I get that, but my entire life,
translation.it: No, lo capisco, ma per tutta la vita

translation.en: all anyone ever talked about was the Harrison Foundation.
translation.it: non ho sentito parlare d'altro che della Fondazione.

translation.en: I felt like everything was mapped out for me, especially by Aunt Jean.
translation.it: Sentivo che il mio futuro era già scritto, soprattutto da zia Jean.

translation.en: Okay. I wouldn't like that either, feeling like I don't have a choice.
translation.it: Ok. Non piacerebbe neanche a me sentire di non avere scelta.

translation.en: Yeah, that's why I bought that camera, that plane ticket. I had to get out before I got trapped.
translation.it: Già. Così comprai la macchina fotografica e partii, prima di finire in trappola.

translation.en: Well, you have a great career doing what you love.
translation.it: Stai avendo successo facendo quello che ami.

translation.en: I understand not wanting to give that up.
translation.it: Capisco che tu non voglia rinunciarci.

translation.en: I loved it in the beginning
when I was caught up in the excitement of that kinda life.
translation.it: quand'ero preso dall'euforia di quello stile di vita.

translation.en: But now…
Now?
You wanna go get a hot cider?
Yeah. Sure, I have time.
Let's go to Nick's Café.
-Nick's? -Nick's.
-Seriously, thank you so much for today. -You're welcome.
translation.it: - Sul serio, grazie mille per oggi. - Figurati.

translation.en: Yeah. I'm ashamed to say that I've seen the financial reports,
translation.it: Mi vergogno ad ammettere che ho visto i resoconti finanziari,

translation.en: but that is the first time that I've seen people directly benefiting
translation.it: ma è la prima volta che vedo la gente trarre diretto beneficio

translation.en: from my family's foundation.
It was something.
You were great with the kids. Like it or not, I think you're a natural.
translation.it: Sei stato fantastico con i bambini. Ci sai fare.

translation.en: Thanks.
Enough about me; did you always wanna be a chef and caterer?
translation.it: Ora basta parlare di me. Hai sempre voluto fare la cuoca?

translation.en: Yeah, when I was a kid, I used to have Christmas tea parties
translation.it: Sì, da piccola, organizzavo l'ora del tè

translation.it: con le bambole e i dinosauri.

translation.en: Dinosaurs? At a Christmas tea party?
T-Rex would have three helpings, which is the greatest compliment for a cook.
translation.it: Il T-Rex faceva il tris. È il più grande complimento.

translation.en: -Was probably the best meal of his life. -It was.
I hope your aunt feels the same way.
translation.it: Spero lo pensi anche tua zia.

translation.en: Look, please do not stress about her.
I'm gonna be with you every step of the way, I promise.
Thank you.
Isabella, my agent.
We've talked so much about me and the foundation, -I really wanna… -[chiming resumes]
translation.it: Abbiamo parlato tanto di me e della Fondazione, ora vorrei…

translation.en: I'm sorry.
No, she's… not extremely patient. Probably makes her a great agent.
translation.it: Non è molto paziente. Forse è per questo che è così brava.

translation.en: That's okay. We should get going anyway.
I left Christina holding down the fort.
I guess we should.
Oh, Carson, give me some advice.
Do you think that candle should be over there?
-Balance? -Uh…
No. No, I think it looks great.
translation.it: No. No, penso che così sia perfetto.

translation.en: How are plans going for the dinner?
It's great. She's great.
Everything is going to be… oh, what's the word I'm looking for?
translation.it: Sarà tutto… Qual è la parola che cerco?

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
-Great. -Great.
I know this isn't how you would choose to spend your time at home,
translation.it: So che preferiresti fare altro mentre sei qui,

translation.en: but I do appreciate the help.
Of course.
To tell you the truth, catering, event planning, it's kind of fun.
translation.it: A essere sincero, organizzare il catering e gli eventi è divertente.

translation.en: This is the first year we won't have a silent auction.
translation.it: Questo sarà il primo anno in cui non avremo un'asta silenziosa.

translation.en: -What about the antiques? -I'm afraid that didn't work out.
translation.it: - E i pezzi d'antiquariato? - Niente da fare, temo.

translation.en: It is what it is.
We will get through the best we can, as always.
translation.it: Ci arrangeremo come potremo, come sempre.

translation.en: -There has to be other places-- -It's too late in the year.
translation.it: - Ci saranno altri posti… - Ormai è tardi.

translation.en: People are already gone for the holidays.
translation.it: La gente è via per le vacanze.

translation.en: It's been a long day. I'm tired, I'm gonna turn in. Good night.
translation.it: È stata una lunga giornata. Sono stanca. Vado a letto. Buonanotte.

translation.en: Good night.
Okay.
You taking that up for Aunt Jean?
translation.it: Lo porti su a zia Jean?

translation.en: -Is she feeling okay? -Oh, don't worry, she's not ill.
translation.it: - Sta bene? - Non preoccuparti, non è malata.

translation.en: I think it's just all the stress of the Gala.
translation.it: Penso che sia solo lo stress del gala.

translation.en: A couple more days, it'll be over for another year.
translation.it: Ancora un paio di giorni e sarà tutto finito.

translation.en: Carson, Jean has devoted her entire life to this foundation
translation.it: Carson, Jean ha dedicato tutta la sua vita a questa Fondazione

translation.en: and to serving the people of the community.
She deserves to be catered to now and then.
translation.it: Merita di essere servita, ogni tanto.

translation.en: I appreciate how much you care.
translation.it: Apprezzo il tuo affetto per lei.

translation.en: It's impossible for anyone who knows your aunt not to care about her.
translation.it: È impossibile non affezionarsi a tua zia.

translation.en: It is rare to meet someone who is so genuinely selfless.
translation.it: È raro incontrare qualcuno di così genuinamente altruista.

translation.en: Now, if you'll excuse me.
Robert, she's lucky to have you.
Thank you for saying so.
Now, I need to call a few more auction houses, see if I can find anything at all.
translation.it: Chiamerò qualche altra casa d'aste per vedere se trovo qualcosa.

translation.en: That's a good idea.
-Hi. -Hi.
I haven't seen you for a few days.
translation.it: Non ti vedo da due giorni.

translation.en: I've been prepping at my place with Christina.
-I sent you updates. -Oh, I know.
translation.it: - Ti ho inviato gli aggiornamenti. - Lo so.

translation.en: I just like getting the updates in person better.
translation.it: È solo che preferisco riceverli di persona.

translation.en: Well, we're in good shape. Ahead of schedule, actually.
translation.it: Beh, siamo in anticipo sui tempi.

translation.en: -Good. -I just came to drop a few things off.
I have a second cooler, if you wouldn't mind.
Oh, of course not.
How's Jean feeling?
Oh, better. I think she was just upset 'cause of the silent auction.
translation.it: Meglio. Penso che fosse solo delusa per l'asta silenziosa.

translation.en: I called a dozen places, and nothing.
translation.it: Ho chiamato una dozzina di posti, ma niente.

translation.en: Won't people donate to the foundation with or without the auction?
translation.it: La gente non farà comunque donazioni, con o senza asta?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, they will, but… it's tradition.
translation.it: Sì, è così, ma è una tradizione.

translation.en: I think people like party favors, even if they pay for it themselves.
translation.it: Alla gente piacciono gli omaggi, anche se pagano per averli.

translation.en: -You've been taking photos all week. -Yeah, every week.
translation.it: - Hai fatto foto per tutta la settimana. - Sì, ogni settimana.

translation.en: -How many do you have? -Oh, I don't know, hundreds.
translation.it: - Quante ne hai? - Non saprei, un centinaio.

translation.en: -I haven't counted. -Will you show me?
Yes.
How long to get them printed and framed?
translation.it: E se le stampassi e incorniciassi?

translation.en: Molly, that is a brilliant idea.
Do we have everything?
Yeah, I think so.
And…
I got this for Aunt Jean's collection.
translation.it: ho preso questa per la collezione di zia.

translation.en: -I think she'll like it. -Yeah, I think so too.
translation.it: - Penso che le piacerà. - Sì, anch'io.

translation.en: Should we tell her?
Well, why don't we set everything up first, and then we could surprise her just before the Gala?
translation.it: Perché non prepariamo tutto e le facciamo una sorpresa prima del gala?

translation.en: Okay. Sounds like a plan.
translation.it: Ok. Mi sembra un buon piano.

translation.en: Do you think people are actually gonna bid on these?
translation.it: Pensi che faranno offerte per queste?

translation.en: -Are you fishing for a compliment? -[laughs]

Well, now it just feels like a chore.

I don't think so.
Once this Gala is done, I think I am going to have to focus on finding someone else.

-Yeah, they'll be here by four. -Great.

You really like him.

I have never heard you gush about anyone like that.

Very funny.

translation.en: Okay.
I just…
Well, I believe that life's too short to leave the most important things left unsaid.

-I gotta go. I'll see you there. -Yeah, see you there.

-I see. -Muffin?

After tonight, you'll be off the hook for another year.

[Jean] What did you do?

-Thank you. -Oh!

Did you say that?

Look, I've met a lot of people in my life,

-Carson! -Isabella.
-Hi. -What are you doing here?

Well?

Come on, we need to go. Go grab your stuff.

Carson, this gig is everything we've been working towards.

No, you're right.

But that means that he's leaving.

-Great! -Great!

Gingerbread, my favorite.

translation.en: Good evening. Good evening, ladies and gentlemen.
Welcome to this year's Christmas Gala for the Harrison Foundation.

translation.it: sulla differenza che facciamo ogni giorno nella vita delle persone.

Enjoy your drinks, enjoy dinner, enjoy the night.

What a terrific evening!
It really is.
Can I help you with something?
Please chill this for later.

Assigning him to oversee the catering

Thank you very much.
Cheers.

All right, we will.
Yeah. It means a lot to a lot of people.

translation.en: -If you'll excuse me. -Of course.
Hey, you wanna take a break? I can handle it from here.

translation.en: -Am I that obvious? -No, but I know you.

I owe you one.

translation.en: Never give up on your dream, and look at him now.

If you were happy with our services,
I know she'd be grateful if you left a positive review online.

translation.en: -That's it? -That's it.
Sure. It's the least I can do.

-Oh, it was a great evening! -Mm-hmm. [laughs]
Well, what a night.
I just came to say good night.

translation.en: Do what you need to do.
I understand.
You do?
Carson, the foundation has always been my passion.

I really appreciate everything you did for us this week.

-Good night, Robert. -Good night.
[clicks tongue] Well…
apart from Carson leaving early, this night could not have been better.
translation.it: a parte la partenza anticipata di Carson, questa serata non poteva andare meglio.

translation.en: I had every faith in you.
Oh, Robert, you truly are the best. I don't know what I would do without you.

translation.en: No, wait.
There's something that I have wanted to tell you for a long time now.

I don't know what I would do without you, and I never want to find out.

-Will you marry me? -Oh, yes.
Oh, yes, Robert.
I love you too. Yes!
Hey!

Jimmy's got a bunch of single friends that I can introduce you to.

translation.en: -If you're sure. -Yeah.
Aww! Merry Christmas.
-Good job on the Gala. -Merry Christmas.
Yeah.
I like this. I'm glad you like it.
[clears throat] What's all this?
We're getting married.
[gasps] Well, it's about time.
-Congratulations. -Oh, thank you.
-Oh, congratulations. -Thank you.
Oh, Robert, congratulations.
I'd say, "Welcome to the family," but you've always been a part of it.

I'm so sorry you have to leave.
Me too.

Only you know that.
Carson, you say you see the world through a lens,

translation.en: I love you.
I love you too.
Congratulations again, you crazy kids.
Bye.
